string.value: #b#p9010010##k seems to have something urgent to tell you.

Teach those violent monkeys and Malady a lesson and report back to Estelle.

#o3210800# #r#a98411##k 
#o4230101# #r#a98412##k
#o5300100# #r#a98413##k
You eliminated the monkeys that were pestering Estelle.
Hurry! This is urgent! Please promise me that you'll help!

Whew! Thanks. Now, do something about those monkeys. What monkeys? Those horrible monkeys that throw bananas at anyone who passes by! Estelle hasn't been able to go anywhere because of those violent monkeys.

Eliminate #r50 #o3210800#s#k and #r40 #o4230101#s#k. While you're at it, please eliminate #r10 Witch #o5300100#s#k as well. Once you're done, be sure to let #b#p1032105##k know that you eliminated the monkeys.
So you're saying you don't want to help me?
Eliminate #r50 Lupins, 40 Zombie Lupins, and 10 Maladys#k. Once you're done, report back to #bEstelle#k and let her know.
Have you received the request from #bCassandra#k yet? Please defeat #r50 Lupins, 40 Zombie Lupins, and 10 Maladys#k so that I can walk around freely.
